short_summary: Seeking two Senior Computer Application Support Specialists to work on Modernized Command & Control Information Systems (MC2IS) project in support of Space Domain Awareness (SDA)
description: The main purpose is to work with the Modernized Command & Contract Information Systems (MC2IS) project in support of the Directorate of Space requirements (DSR) for interoperability with the United State Space Force (USSF) to perform the following tasks: 1. Working with two teams to implement applications and softwares needed by the MC2IS. 2. To Develop knowledge regarding Space Domain Awareness (SDA) and network interoperability solutions to meet the needs of the recent projects in the department. (continued to next section)
tags: modernaized command and control information system
full_summary:
### Announcement Summary
**Title**: Temporary Help Services for Two Level 3 Computer Application Support Specialists

**Reference number**: `cb-302-32935477`
**Solicitation number**: `W6431-240121`

The Department of National Defence of Canada seeks Temporary Help Services from a contractor to provide two Level 3 Computer Application Support Specialists for a short-term period. The specialists will assist with the Modernized Command and Control Information Systems (MC2IS) project, specifically in supporting the Directorate of Space requirements for interoperability with the United States Space Force (USSF).

**Key Objectives**
* The contractor will provide a team of two Senior Computer Application Support Specialists to work with the DND team on the MC2IS project.
* The temporary help services are required to demonstrate interoperability with the USSF/SPACOMMAND in support of Space Domain Awareness (SDA) through the MC2IS NORAD Modernization initiative.
* The specialists will develop knowledge regarding SDA information exchange requirements and network interoperability solutions in the current MC2IS demonstrator environment.

**Contract Information**

* **Contract duration**: Short-term, expected to begin on November 6, 2023, and end on March 31, 2024.
* **Location**: National Capital Region (NCR).
* **Notice URL**: Not available.

**Documentation**
Access the full notice at [Temporary Help Services for Two Level 3 Computer Application Support Specialists](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22389/w6431-240121-ths_npp-eng.pdf) (English) or [Temporary Help Services for Two Level 3 Computer Application Support Specialists](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22389/w6431-240121-ths_npp-fr.pdf) (French).

**Eligibility**
 * Bidders must have completed a federal government Contracting Officer Approval (COA) process.
 * Bidders must be certified as a Canadian Controlled Private Corporation (CCPC).

**Contact Information**
To obtain further information, please contact Leanne Cooper at [leanne.cooper@forces.gc.ca](mailto:leanne.cooper@forces.gc.ca) or (613) 392-2811. Note that the contracting entity name, national instrument symbol (nibs), and end-user entities name fields are left blank, as per the original text.

**Important Dates**
* **Publication Date**: October 17
